title: The Call of the Wild (Part 9)
description: John Thornton uses his winnings to finance an expedition to the east to look for a fabled lost mine. After much searching, the group finds a river valley rich with gold. Buck ranges farther and wider into the wild, meeting and befriending a wild wolf before returning to the camp.
meta: Use the reading strategy of making, revising, and confirming predictions, to understand a text
Analyze Plot : Analyze plot throughout a text
Hyphenated and Compound Words : Identify and use hyphenated compound adjectives
